mapper.select: SELECT A.BORD_TYPE AS bordType , A.BORD_NO AS bordNo , A.DEL_YN AS delYn , A.BORD_TITLE AS bordTitle , A.BORD_SUB_TITLE AS bordSubTitle , A.BORD_CONTENT AS bordContent , A.BORD_RD_CNT AS bordRdCnt , A.BORD_GD_CNT AS bordGdCnt , A.APT_NO AS aptNo , A.SLLR_NO AS sllrNo , A.REQ_NO AS reqNo , A.CTGR_ID AS ctgrId , (SELECT S.STSF_RATE FROM request110t S WHERE S.REQ_NO = A.REQ_NO AND S.COMPANY_ID = A.SLLR_NO) AS stsfRate , (SELECT COUNT(S.CMMT_NO) FROM IBJ_BORD110T S WHERE S.BORD_NO = A.BORD_NO AND S.DEL_YN = 'N') AS commentCnt , DATE_FORMAT(A.CRE_DATE, '%y.%m.%d %H:%i') AS creDateTxt , (SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(S.BORD_NO) > 0 THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END FROM IBJ_BORD120T S WHERE S.BORD_NO = A.BORD_NO AND S.CRE_USER = #{creUser}) AS reportYn , (SELECT S.NICK_NAME FROM IBJ_PRSN000T S WHERE S.CLERK_NO = A.CRE_USER) AS creUserNm , (SELECT S.IMG_PATH FROM IBJ_PRSN000T S WHERE S.CLERK_NO = A.CRE_USER) AS profileImg , A.CRE_USER AS creUser , A.CRE_DATE AS creDate , A.UPD_USER AS updUser , A.UPD_DATE AS updDate , (SELECT CONCAT(S.FILE_LOC, S.FILE_ID) FROM wit_file000t S WHERE S.BIZ_CD = #{bizCd} AND S.BIZ_KEY = A.BORD_NO LIMIT 1) AS imagePath FROM IBJ_BORD100T A WHERE A.BORD_NO = #{bordNo} AND A.DEL_YN = 'N' ORDER BY A.BORD_NO DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE IBJ_BORD100T SET BORD_RD_CNT = BORD_RD_CNT + 1 WHERE DEL_YN = 'N' AND BORD_NO = #{bordNo}
mapper.select: SELECT CONCAT('BD', LPAD(COALESCE(MAX(CAST(SUBSTRING(T.BORD_NO, 3) AS UNSIGNED)), 0) + 1, 10, '0')) FROM IBJ_BORD100T AS T WHERE 1 = 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO IBJ_BORD100T ( BORD_NO, BORD_KEY, DEL_YN, BORD_TYPE, BORD_TITLE, BORD_SUB_TITLE, BORD_CONTENT, BORD_RD_CNT, BORD_GD_CNT, BORD_ER_CNT, APT_NO, SLLR_NO, REQ_NO, CTGR_ID, CRE_USER, CRE_DATE ) VALUES ( #{bordNo}, #{bordKey}, 'N', #{bordType}, #{bordTitle}, #{bordSubTitle}, #{bordContent}, 0, 0, 0, #{aptNo}, #{sllrNo}, #{reqNo}, #{ctgrId}, #{creUser}, NOW() )

FROM IBJ_BORD110T A WHERE A.BORD_NO = #{bordNo} AND A.DEL_YN = 'N' ORDER BY A.CMMT_NO
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO IBJ_BORD110T ( BORD_NO , CMMT_NO , DEL_YN , CMMT_CONTENT , CMMT_GD_CNT , CMMT_ER_CNT , CRE_USER , CRE_DATE ) VALUES ( #{bordNo} , ( SELECT CONCAT('CM', LPAD(COALESCE(MAX(CAST(SUBSTRING(T.CMMT_NO, 3) AS UNSIGNED)), 0) + 1, 10, '0')) FROM IBJ_BORD110T AS T WHERE BORD_NO = #{bordNo} ) , 'N' , #{cmmtContent} , 0 , 0 , #{creUser} , NOW() )

INSERT INTO IBJ_BORD120T ( BORD_NO , REPORT_SEQ , REPORT_REASON , REPORT_CONTENT , REPORT_STAT , CRE_USER , CRE_DATE ) VALUES ( #{bordNo} , (SELECT IFNULL(MAX(CAST(S.REPORT_SEQ AS UNSIGNED)), 0) + 1 FROM IBJ_BORD120T S WHERE S.BORD_NO = #{bordNo}) , #{reportReason} , #{reportCont} , '10' , #{creUser} , NOW() )
mapper.select: SELECT A.BORD_NO AS bordNo , A.BORD_TYPE AS bordType , (SELECT S.CD_NM FROM wit_code000t S WHERE S.CD_CLS = 'BD001' AND S.CD = A.BORD_TYPE) AS bordTypeNm , A.BORD_TITLE AS bordTitle , (SELECT S.NICK_NAME FROM IBJ_PRSN000T S WHERE S.CLERK_NO = A.CRE_USER) AS creUserNm , (SELECT S.IMG_PATH FROM IBJ_PRSN000T S WHERE S.CLERK_NO = A.CRE_USER) AS profileImg , CASE WHEN TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, A.CRE_DATE, NOW()) < 5 THEN '방금 전' WHEN TIMESTAMPDIFF(HOUR, A.CRE_DATE, NOW()) < 1 THEN CONCAT(TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, A.CRE_DATE, NOW()), '분 전') WHEN TIMESTAMPDIFF(HOUR, A.CRE_DATE, NOW()) < 4 THEN CONCAT(TIMESTAMPDIFF(HOUR, A.CRE_DATE, NOW()), '시간 ', MOD(TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, A.CRE_DATE, NOW()), 60), '분 전') WHEN DATE(A.CRE_DATE) = CURDATE() THEN DATE_FORMAT(A.CRE_DATE, '%H:%i') ELSE DATE_FORMAT(A.CRE_DATE, '%y.%m.%d') END AS creDateTxt , COUNT(A.BORD_NO) AS reportCnt FROM IBJ_BORD100T A , IBJ_BORD120T B WHERE A.DEL_YN = 'N' AND B.BORD_NO = A.BORD_NO AND B.REPORT_STAT = #{reportStat} GROUP BY A.BORD_NO ORDER BY B.CRE_DATE DESC LIMIT #{pageSize} OFFSET #{currentPage}

SELECT A.BORD_NO AS bordNo , REPORT_REASON AS reportReason , REPORT_CONTENT AS reportContent , (SELECT S.NICK_NAME FROM IBJ_PRSN000T S WHERE S.CLERK_NO = A.CRE_USER) AS creUserNm , (SELECT S.IMG_PATH FROM IBJ_PRSN000T S WHERE S.CLERK_NO = A.CRE_USER) AS profileImg , CASE WHEN TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, A.CRE_DATE, NOW()) < 5 THEN '방금 전' WHEN TIMESTAMPDIFF(HOUR, A.CRE_DATE, NOW()) < 1 THEN CONCAT(TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, A.CRE_DATE, NOW()), '분 전') WHEN TIMESTAMPDIFF(HOUR, A.CRE_DATE, NOW()) < 4 THEN CONCAT(TIMESTAMPDIFF(HOUR, A.CRE_DATE, NOW()), '시간 ', MOD(TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, A.CRE_DATE, NOW()), 60), '분 전') WHEN DATE(A.CRE_DATE) = CURDATE() THEN DATE_FORMAT(A.CRE_DATE, '%H:%i') ELSE DATE_FORMAT(A.CRE_DATE, '%y.%m.%d') END AS creDateTxt FROM IBJ_BORD120T A WHERE BORD_NO = #{bordNo} ORDER BY REPORT_SEQ
